title: Kumaradevam
text:
Kumara-devam is a village in <a href="West%20Godavari%20district">West Godavari district</a> of the <a href="India">India</a>n state of <a href="Andhra%20Pradesh">Andhra Pradesh</a>. It is located in <a href="Kovvur%20mandal">Kovvur mandal</a>. Kovvur railway Station and Pasivedala railway Station are the nearest train stations.
Demographics.
 <a href="Census%20of%20India">Census of India</a>, Kumaradevan had a population of 4015. The total population constitutes 1911 males and 2104 females with a sex ratio of 1101 females per 1000 males. 363 children are in the age group of 0–6 years, with sex ratio of 1213. The average literacy rate stands at 72.12%.
